I've played this game for a very long time. It's a fun game, but there's too many cheaters in it that ruin it. It's sad how 3rd party apps like ESEA can develop a better anti cheat than Valve themselves.

I opened this game again today, after a 1-2~ year break. First game I get called a cheater due to good aim and a previous game ban, second game I see someone shooting me facing backwards.. clearly there is a problem. I personally will never recommend this game anymore because the only time I ever enjoy this game is when there's a clean game but that rarely ever happens. It feels like more of a chore than an enjoyment. Also, why do I have to sit in games where there is someone shooting us through 69 different maps and if I abandon the game I get a penalty.. which when I wait out and queue again just happens to usually be another game with a cheater.
